info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 7:21PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Silver Bow County through 800 PM MDT... At 721 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Divide, or 21 miles southwest of Butte, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Butte, Silver Bow, Walkerville, Divide, Nissler, Melrose, Ramsay, Janney and Newcomb. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 214 and 231. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
